exam_style: Detail-heavy, concept-specific. Emphasize key definitions, processes, and exact terminology.
study_tips: Read lectures carefully. Define key terms (exome, metagenomics, aneuploidy, heteroplasmy, penetrance, expressivity, etc). Watch remedial videos (Bozeman Science). Visualize mitosis/meiosis processes.
